name: lands-wrath
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.
